name: Housing Stabilization & Referral Services
description: Resident Services Coordinators are accessible to provide information and referrals to an array of social services including COVID19 testing services and rent relief, food delivery, produce boxes, food pantry, transportation, affordable childcare, primary health care, energy assistance, in-home support services, public benefits, rental assistance and others.
